private  boolean AbstractGenerator.mergeFieldIfDefInBothClasses(Table table, org.exolab.castor.mapping.xml.ClassMapping cm, org.exolab.castor.mapping.xml.FieldMapping extendFm)
          the field will be merged if it is defined in parent class and child class with different attributes
private  void AbstractGenerator.processExtendedClass(Table table, org.exolab.castor.mapping.xml.ClassMapping cm)
          Following rules are applied for processing extended class:
  • If child does not define identity use the one from parent (name and type)
  • If child defines identity with same or no type use name from child and type from parent
  • If child type and parent type do not match log/show error This function also process the multi column identities
